text: 3.9: Lo 27.26; Ro 1.17; 3.21Mba Moses suaŋgi tɨvi mbui ŋaar, nta nza mbui tɨvi ga nzuav nza nzuav, khaŋ nza nzuai, nza fhɨrgirɨgɨp, ŋgu mbatɨgar ŋgegɨrga. Mba ŋaar maaŋ muuŋgip, Fhe Bakɨmen vhava ŋaara bakɨme phorgɨp hɨrga, Fhe Bakɨme nɨman tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigi ki ŋaar, ana guigira Fhe Bakɨmen vhava ŋaara bakɨ guarara phorgɨp hɨrga.
